Class BaseSprite

java.lang.Object
BaseSprite
All Implemented Interfaces:

CollisionSprite, DroppedCoin, Enemy, Shop
public abstract class BaseSprite extends Object implements BaseSpriteI

Aidan Scott & Adrien
